discourse_list.title: Call for interest in becoming a Dai Foundation board member

content.content: Do you want to join the work to protect Maker’s intangible assets? Dai Foundation has committed to include two members appointed by MakerDAO on its board. We invite interested persons to register their interest so we can gauge the interest and plan the selection/ratification process together with GovAlpha. Before doing so please aquiant yourself with the general requirements for becoming a Dai Foundation board member as presented on the call Focus On #9: Dai Foundation Core Unit Update (the brief starts around 20 minutes in). There will also be an opportunity to meet board members in person on July 19th during EthCC to learn more about what being a board member involves. If you have any additional questions please reach out to soren or one of the other members of the board You register your interest by reaching out to @sorenpeter via discord, the forum or email, and you can also reach out with any questions around what is required to participate in the board work. Based on the interest we will engage GovAlpha around end of Q3 to discuss the Maker Governance process around the appointment (eg whether it will be a confirmation or a selection process)
This topic was automatically closed after 90 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
